'''King''' is a Swedish {{w|video game developer}}, with headquarters in {{w|Stockholm}} and {{w|London}} and are most notable for creating ''{{W|Candy Crush Saga}}''. They are owned by [[Microsoft]] who is also the parent company of [[Mojang Studios]].

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
in 2025, Mojang Studios and King collaborated to create an upcoming mobile game titled ''[[Minecraft Blast]]'', which is currently in development by both companies.<ref name="MCB-minecraft.net">{{citation|url=https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/about-minecraft-blast|title=Minecraft Blast|section=|website=[[Minecraft.net]]|author=|date=November 13, 2025|quote=|archive-url=https://web.archive.org/web/20251113165243/https://www.minecraft.net/en-us/about-minecraft-blast}}</ref>
The game will combine modern match puzzle gameplay with scenarios that are ''Minecraft'' themed.
Currently, the game can only be playtested in Malaysia and Canada on devices running iOS and iPadOS.<ref>{{YouTube link|Qi4KQ3CB6dg|archive=|Minecraft Blast|iplaygames7127|November 10, 2025|t=}}</ref>
